body_html:
@caisq we are aware. This is already being worked on.
This is slowed down due to the confusion about multiple python versions supported. A protocol about what python versions are going to be supported is being prepared, and we will clarify our python 3 support story with that going forward.

@boegel one of my concerns is the evaluation time of this file (which I do not fully know).
Is it being evaluated when we are building the pip package? So if we build the pip package on a py 3.6 system, then if people end up installing this on a py 3.4 system, do they not get py 3.4?
I guess if setup.py gets evaluated during installation, this should be OK.
@yifeif in case she can answer this concern.
